response.overview: Trent Reznor is playing the role of a troll, who reflects on one side how pure hatred, ecstatic empathyless forum raids brought him to an "endlager" that rids itself of trolls after certain social media platforms don't see any need for them anymore after rage baits, death threats and fake stories don't bring in the clicks that usually generate inflated ratings on the stock market or rather, when democratic instruments ban them from the internet.
response.title: massenunterbringung der lieblosigkeit
